scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation Of Micro Food Processing Enterprises
description: A Centrally Sponsored Scheme by the Ministry of Food Processing Industries, designed to address the challenges faced by the micro-enterprises and to tap the potential of groups and cooperatives in supporting the upgradation and formalization of these enterprises.
benefits: Support to individuals and groups of micro-enterprises.
Setting up a robust project management framework.
Credit-linked capital subsidy @35% of the eligible project cost with a maximum ceiling of â‚¹ 10,00,000 per unit for individual micro food processing units.
Grant @35% with credit linkage for Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs) and Producer Cooperatives.
Seed capital @ Rs40,000/- per member of SHG for working capital and purchase of small tools for Self-Help Groups (SHGs).
eligibility: New Units for individuals or groups (only for One District One Product - ODOP)
Existing micro food processing units in operations.
The enterprise should be unincorporated and should employ less than 10 workers.
The enterprise should preferably be involved in the product identified in the ODOP of the district.
Applicant should have ownership rights of the enterprise.
Applicant should be above 18 years of age and should possess at least VIII standard pass educational qualification.
Only one person from one family would be eligible for obtaining financial assistance (family includes self, spouse, and children).
documents: Aadhaar Copy & Photo of all promoters/guarantors
Address Proof (Utility bill, Property tax receipt, Ration Card)
Photocopy of Bank Statement/ Bank Passbook for the last 6 months
Udhayam Registration Certificate/ IE code/ Licenses (Trade License/Shop & Establishment Registration/Panchayat License/Corporation License/Municipality License)
Audited balance sheet with annexures (for existing enterprises)
Copy of License as per industry (Eg. FSSAI, Pollution Clearance, ESI etc)
List of existing machinery and equipment
Resolution copy signed by all the members of SHG to avail loans (for SHGs)
Estimates and Quotation of all capital machineries and equipment
